zero_state.title: 你还什么都没干呢
zero_state.description: 一旦你开始使用本平台，你的活动将会显示在这里。

zero_state.title: 你没有{tab}状态的赏金项目
zero_state.description: 看起来你现在没有{tab}状态的赏金项目. 在这里输入标题新建一个吧！

zero_state.title: 无法找到赏金项目
zero_state.description: 尝试刷新，并检查你的URL是否正确。

meta.label: 赏金项目
meta.tooltip: 私有赏金项目要求用户提交申请。当你的申请被同意以后，你就可以为该项目提交成果了。

issue_rating.issuer1: 你的赏金项目提交已被接受！如果你有兴趣，你可以给这次工作经历评分：
issue_rating.issuer2: 这将帮助此平台上其他项目完成者设定期望值
issue_rating.fulfiller1: 你接受了对你赏金项目的提交！ 如果你有兴趣，你可以为此项目完成者评分：
issue_rating.fulfiller2: 这将帮助此平台上其他项目提供者设定期望值。

applicant_card.declined_message: 申请被拒绝的状态只对你可见

zero_state.title: 无申请者
zero_state.description: 申请该赏金项目的人将显示在这里。

zero_state.title: 无回复
zero_state.description: 用上面的表单来提交回复

zero_state.title: 无提交
zero_state.description: 此赏金项目的提交将显示在这里
zero_state.private_description: 此赏金项目的提交已被设为私有
zero_state.bounty_owner_description: 对此赏金项目的提交会显示在这里并只对你可见。另外, 项目完成者可以看到他们创建的提交。

submissions_card.notice: 此赏金项目的提交被隐藏
submissions_card.bounty_owner_notice: 提交只对你和完成者可见
submissions_card.fulfiller_notice: 你的提交只对你和项目提供者可见。

new_bounty.title: 撤消更改？
new_bounty.description: 如果你离开此页面，你对你的赏金项目所做的更改将会被撤销，赏金项目将会还原到之前的状态。

draft_or_edit_bounty.title: 撤消更改？
draft_or_edit_bounty.description: 如果你离开此页面并没有创建草稿或激活项目，你的赏金项目将被撤销

activate_dead_form.title: 重新激活你的赏金项目
activate_dead_form.description: 标明押金的金额来激活这个赏金项目。你的押金最少与你提供的报酬金额相等({minimumBalance} {token_symbol}).
activate_dead_form.min_deposit_warning: 你的初始押金最少与你提供的报酬金额相等。

activate_draft_form.title: 激活你的赏金项目
activate_draft_form.description: 标明初始押金的金额来激活这个赏金项目。 你的押金最少与你提供的报酬金额相等： {minimumBalance} {token_symbol}
activate_draft_form.min_deposit_warning: 你的初始押金最少与你提供的报酬金额相等。

contribute.title: 增加赏金余额
contribute.description: 标明你要捐助给此赏金项目的金额 ({token_symbol}).
contribute.title_issuer: 给此赏金项目提供余额
contribute.description_issuer: 标明你要为此赏金项目增加的金额 ({token_symbol}).

extend_deadline_error.title: 截止日期需要设在将来才能激活你的赏金项目。

extend_deadline_form.title: 延长截止日期
extend_deadline_form.description: 标明你希望将此赏金项目截止日期延长到的时间 {timezone, select, null { } other { (timezone={timezone})}}

fulfill_bounty.title: 输入提交详情
fulfill_bounty.description: 为你的赏金项目提交提供详情, 包括赏金项目描述中指出的任何完成此赏金项目所需内容的链接。 你可以用Markdown为你的提交描述排版。

form.private_notice: 在此输入的所有信息都会储存在公开的以太币(Ethereum)网络，但将在此网站被隐藏。
form.public_notice: 在此输入的所有信息都会储存在公开的以太币(Ethereum)网络，并且会在此网站公开显示。

fulfiller_application.title: 输入申请详情
fulfiller_application.description: 写一写为什么你认为你适合完成此赏金项目。 你可以随意提供相关工作或经历的链接。

increase_payout.title: 增加报酬
increase_payout.description1:
标明你要将报酬提高到的金额。这可以包括额外用于承担各类费用的金额。

Your total balance must be greater than the new prize amount ({token_symbol}). The current balance is: {minimumBalance, number} {token_symbol}. The current payout amount is: {minimumPayout, number} {token_symbol}.
increase_payout.description2:
Indicate the amount you would like to increase the payout to.

Your total balance must be greater than the new prize amount ({token_symbol}). The current balance is: {minimumBalance, number} {token_symbol}. The current payout amount is: {minimumPayout, number} {token_symbol}.
increase_payout.balance_warning: The balance of your bounty must be greater than the payout amount.
increase_payout.payout_warning: Your payout amount must be greater than the previous payout amount.

kill_bounty.title: 你确定要取消激活你的赏金项目吗？
kill_bounty.description: 如果你改变主意，你可以随时重新激活此项目。

transfer_ownership.title: 转移所有权
transfer_ownership.description: 包括接收者的钱包地址。

zero_state.title: Could not find that bounty
zero_state.description: Try refreshing, or make sure your url is correct

create_bounty.deposit_warning: Deposit amount must at least match the payout amount.
create_bounty.payout_warning: Payout amount may not be larger than the balance.

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: Enter your details about this bounty.
about.notice: Enter a title and description for your bounty. A
about.notice2: preview will automatically be generated as you type, which you can view by clicking the preview button. Feel free to use the description template provided below, or clear the field to create your own.

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: Who will be the primary contact for bounty questions and submissions?

details.title: DETAILS
details.description: How should this bounty be classified?
details.notice: Enter the categories and difficulty level for the bounty. Since difficulty can be fairly subjective, it is helpful to provide more details around required experience within your bounty description.

revisions.title: REVISIONS
revisions.notice: Enter the maximum number of revisions you may require for this task, in order to help set expectations for the contributors.

attachments.title: ATTACHMENTS
attachments.description: Does this bounty require any external assets for completion?
attachments.notice: Attach any files or links that may be helpful as references or necessary for a contributor to complete the bounty.

deadline.title: DEADLINE
deadline.description: When will this bounty be due?
deadline.notice: Enter the date and time for this bounty's deadline {timezone, select, null { } other {(timezone={timezone})}}

privacy.title: PRIVACY
privacy.description: Will submissions be visible to everyone?
privacy.notice: Submissions can be hidden from other users if desired.

private_fullfillments.label: Visibility
private_fullfillments.description: Do you want to approve people before they can fulfill your bounty?
private_fullfillments.notice: If you require approval, you will be notified when a user indicates their intent to submit, and will be required to approve them before they are allowed to complete your bounty.

payout.title: PAYOUT
payout.notice: Select the token and enter the amount you will award for completion of this bounty.

fulfillment_amount.label: Payout amount {hasDefaultToken, select, true {} false {(ETH or whole tokens)}}

token_contract_2.label: Token
token_contract_2.placeholder: Select token or enter token address...

payout_editing.title: PAYOUT
payout_editing.notice: Enter the amount you will award for the completion of this bounty. The payout may not be larger than your current balance of {balance} {token_symbol} . If you would like to add more funds to the bounty, please increase your balance.

fulfillment_amount.label: Payout amount {hasDefaultToken, select, true {} false {(ETH or whole tokens)}}

token_contract_2.label: Token
token_contract_2.placeholder: Select token or enter token address...

save.title: SAVE OR SUBMIT
save.description: When would you like to submit and activate the bounty?
save.notice: If you wish to activate the bounty later, you can save it as a draft. The requirements for a bounty can only be edited while it is in the draft stage. At minimum, your deposit amount must match your payout amount.

zero_state.title: No Bounties Found
zero_state.description: Update your search filters to see more bounties

zero_state_error.title: Uh oh, something happened
zero_state_error.description: Try a new filter or refresh the page and try again

zero_state.title: No Results Yet
zero_state.description: As bounties are issues and submissions are completed, this leaderboard will begin to populate

zero_state_error.title: Uh oh, something happened
zero_state_error.description: Try to refresh the page and try again

details.title: Profile Details
details.description: Add some profile details about yourself, so that others on the platform have an idea of your background and skillset, and can find you elsewhere online.
details.description2:
Welcome to the Bounties Network! We're excited to see what you bounty.

Before you get started, we encourage you to add some profile details about yourself, so that others on the platform have an idea of your background and skillset.

address_mismatch.title: Wallet address does not match
address_mismatch.description1: You were previously signed in to
address_mismatch.description4: This address does not match your current wallet account address:
address_mismatch.description5: . Please switch your wallet account, or log out of the Bounties Network and sign in using a different address.

sign_in.title: Sign in and verify address
sign_in.description: After clicking "Continue", a wallet dialogue will prompt you to verify your unique address. Once you verify, you'll be signed in to the network.

signing_in.title: Complete signature request to verify your address and sign in

unlock.description1: You'll need to log in and/or grant access to your secure wallet (e.g.

wallet_required.description2: , please install a secure wallet such as
wallet_required.description3: If you'd like help getting set up, take a look at our

wrong_network.title: Foreign network detected
wrong_network.description2: Please switch your active wallet network.

zero_state.title: You have no notifications
zero_state.description: Once you start using the platform, notifications will show here.

zero_state.title: No Reviews Found
zero_state.description: We didn't find any reviews associated with this action.

zero_state.title: No User Found
zero_state.description: Check that the address is correct and try again

unsaved_changes.title: Discard Changes?
unsaved_changes.description: If you decide to leave this page without confirming your changes, the changes made to your profile will be discarded and your profile will be reverted to its previous state.

emails.title: EMAIL NOTIFICATIONS
emails.description: What notifications would you like to receive via email?
emails.notice: Opt in or out of the notifications you wish to receive via email. We recommend sticking with the default settings so that you can be informed of important activity relevant to you on the network.

notification_options.transfer_recipient: Bounty transfer to another user completes
notification_options.bounty_comment_received: A bounty you fulfilled receives a comment
notification_options.bounty_comment_received_commenter: A bounty you commented on receives a comment
notification_options.fulfillment_comment_received_issuer: A submission to your bounty receives a comment
notification_options.fulfillment_comment_received_commenter: A submission you commented on receives a comment
notification_options.bounty_changed: A bounty you fulfilled is changed
notification_options.bounty_changed_applicant: A bounty you applied for is changed
notification_options.fulfillment_updated_issuer: Fulfiller, updates their fulfillment on your bounty
notification_options.fulfillment_submitted_issuer: Fulfiller, submits a new fulfillment to your bounty
notification_options.contribution_received: Another user contributes funds to your bounty
notification_options.bounty_completed: Bounty no longer has enough funds to pay out
notification_options.activity: General activity (updated profile, created bounty, etc.)

photo.title: PROFILE PHOTO
photo.label: Image upload failed, please try again.

about.title: ABOUT
about.description: What would you like people to know about you?
about.notice: Enter some of your personal details so that the community can get to know you.

skills.title: SKILLS
skills.description: What are some of your professional or technical skills?
skills.notice: Enter or select the skills for which you are proficient. This will help others on the network be confident in your ability to fulfill certain types of bounties.
skills.label: Skills

social.title: SOCIAL
social.description: Do you have any other social profiles you would like displayed?

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.description: Where would you like to receive status notifications about your bounties and fulfillments?

marketing.label: I would also like to receive relevant bounty suggestions and platform updates

zero_state.title: You have {currentTab} 0 submissions
zero_state.description: It looks like you don't have any submissions. Come back after you have {currentTab} a fulfillment!

tx_guide.title: Your wallet will take it from here!
tx_guide.description: After clicking "OK", a wallet dialogue will prompt you to confirm your Ethereum transaction and pay a small amount of ETH (for gas fees).
tx_guide.notice: A default gas limit and price will be set for you.

messages.waiting: Waiting for your transaction to be confirmed on the blockchain...
messages.pending_receipt: Your transaction is being processed. We will notify you once it is confirmed.
messages.pending_wallet: Confirming Ethereum transaction with your enabled wallet. This may take a few seconds.

editor.default:
# Description
Describe the bounty that you want completed. What is it for? What does it involve?

## Requirements
What requirements do you have for bounty fulfillers? Are there any rules or constraints for your bounty? Are there any pre-requisites needed to complete it?

* Item one
* Item two
* Item three

## Definition of Done
What should bounty issuers submit as proof that they have completed the bounty? What do fulfillers need to include in a submission in order for it to be accepted?

1. Item 1
2. Item 2
3. Item 3

### Things to Note
Is there any other information you'd like potential fulfillers to know about you or the bounty? Does the bounty require any additional materials that either party needs to provide or information exchanged for external communication to occur?

notifications.bounty_changed: A bounty you submitted to was updated
notifications.bounty_changed_applicant: A bounty you applied to was updated
notifications.issuer_transferred: You transferred ownership of your bounty
notifications.transfer_recipient: Ownership of a bounty was transferred to you
notifications.bounty_comment_received: A bounty you fulfilled received a comment
notifications.bounty_comment_received_commenter: A bounty you commented on received a comment
notifications.fulfillment_comment_received_issuer: A submission to your bounty received a comment
notifications.fulfillment_comment_received_commenter: A submission you commented on received a comment
notifications.fulfillment_updated_issuer: A submission to your bounty was updated
notifications.bounty_completed: Your bounty ran out of funds

zero_state.subtext: If you don't wish to sign in but want to explore, feel free to check out some bounties using the

errors.form_error: Fix the errors above and re-submit.
